statements: UPDATE augmented_reality_user_data SET user_name = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 12345;

UPDATE user_settings SET ar_settings = '{"language": "en", "timezone": "UTC"}' WHERE user_id = 2;

UPDATE user_data SET ar_data_1 = '{"key": "value"}', ar_data_2 = '{}' WHERE user_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';

UPDATE user_data SET ar_experience_rating = 4.5, ar_usage_history = 'Updated usage' WHERE user_id = 201;

UPDATE ar_user_preferences SET preferred_theme='Dark', preferred_language='English' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE ar_device_data SET device_name='iPhone X', os_version='iOS 15' WHERE device_id=2;
